    • Method Detail

      • setExtPinpadPortMode

        int setExtPinpadPortMode(int portMode)
                  throws android.os.RemoteException

        set the base Pinpad port function mode.

        The mode includes

        • com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.MODE_TRANSPARENT
        • com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.MODE_PP1000V3_PINPAD
        • com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.MODE_PP1000V3_CTLS

        default mode is ExternalSerialConst.MODE_TRANSPARENT. This mode will not be lost after power off.

        Note that: because base Pinpad port has only one, when you set one mode, other mode function interfaces will not be used. unless you reset the mode.

        Parameters:
        portMode - you can set ExternalSerialConst.MODE_TRANSPARENT, or ExternalSerialConst.MODE_PP1000V3_PINPAD, or ExternalSerialConst.MODE_PP1000V3_CTLS. other value will not be set but will return current pinpan port mode value.
        Returns:
        current pinpad port mode value.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • isExternalConnected

        boolean isExternalConnected()
                     throws android.os.RemoteException

        check if pos connects pinpad successfully?

        Returns:
        true success. false fail.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • openSerialPort

        boolean openSerialPort(int portNum,
                       SerialDataControl dataControl)
                throws android.os.RemoteException

        open serial port and set serial port config (including baud rate, data bit, stop bit, parity bit). if the serial port has opend, return true directly.

        Parameters:
        portNum - : com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_PINPAD or com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_RS232.
        dataControl - : set serial port config. please see com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.
        Returns:
        true success. false fail.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • writeSerialPort

        int writeSerialPort(int portNum,
                    byte[] writeData,
                    int dataLength)
             throws android.os.RemoteException

        non-blocking write serial port data.

        Parameters:
        portNum - : com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_PINPAD or com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_RS232.
        writeData - : transport writing data buffer
        dataLength - : transport writing data length
        Returns:
        the length of the data actually sent. if return 0, means no data was sent. if return negative number, please see com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • readSerialPort

        int readSerialPort(int portNum,
                   byte[] readData,
                   int dataLength)
            throws android.os.RemoteException

        non-blocking read serial port data.

        Parameters:
        portNum - : com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_PINPAD or com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_RS232.
        readData - : transport reading data buffer
        dataLength - : transport reading data length (the length can not be larger than the buffer size)
        Returns:
        the length of the data actually readed; if return 0, means no data was readed. if return negative number, please see com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • safeWriteSerialPort

        int safeWriteSerialPort(int portNum,
                        byte[] writeData,
                        int Length,
                        long timeoutMs)
                 throws android.os.RemoteException

        block writing serial port data until timeout.

        Parameters:
        portNum - : com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_PINPAD or com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_RS232.
        writeData - : transport writing data buffer
        dataLength - : transport writing data length
        timeoutMs - : overtime time(unit is milliseconds)
        Returns:
        the length of the data actually sent. if return 0, means no data was sent. if return negative number, please see com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • safeReadSerialPort

        int safeReadSerialPort(int portNum,
                       byte[] readData,
                       int Length,
                       long timeoutMs)
                throws android.os.RemoteException

        block reading serial port data until timeout.

        Parameters:
        portNum - : com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_PINPAD or com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.PORT_RS232.
        readData - : transport reading data buffer
        dataLength - : transport reading data length (the length can not be larger than the buffer size)
        timeoutMs - : overtime time(unit is milliseconds)
        Returns:
        the length of the data actually readed; if return 0, means no data was readed. if return negative number, please see com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl.ExternalSerialConst.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
